page.title: 10RAWTHORPE AND KIRKHEATON
page.content: The Rawthorpe area begins at the top of a "{scar}"and occupies the downward slope of the dip.Densely populated it includes two council estates built since 1931 and some private housing.The developers have included many grassy verges and trees.Local history is rather obscure and some people prefer{to identify with Dalton. The church was built in a modern style during the last 20 years and many local people made donations towards the cost.Rawthorpe High School,Junior School and Infant School have been built on the same campus to serve the area.In contrast,{Kirkheaton}retains its village atmosphere with the church being a central feature.Private housing development has taken place but{pleasant countryside surrounds the {area.}Jarmain's,ICI and T.W.Broadbent are the major firms.
